import background from './img/background.png' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'react-grid-system'; const Apropos = () => { return (
Card Title Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.

A propos

); } export default Apropos;
